verbs.description: [ARG1: President Trump 's praise for Kim Jong - un] [ARGM-ADV: even] [V: extended] [ARG2: to a tip of the hat to North Korea 's fawning media – including the breathless propaganda anchor who sang Kim 's praises on state TV] .
